blogPost.excerpt: Universal widgets, charts and ready-to-use screens collected and coded. Get perfectly coded website or web-application with helpful tools included. Package includes HTML, CSS, JS code and Figma sources.
blogPost.body: Universal widgets, charts and ready-to-use screens collected and coded. Get perfectly coded website or web-application with helpful tools included. Package includes HTML, CSS, JS code and Figma sources.
blogPost.title: Motherboard Dashboards - Fully coded design solution for web-applications creating
blogPost.author: Andrey Pudov

localize.description: 收集和编码的通用部件、图表和即用屏幕。获得完美编码的网站或网络应用，包括有用的工具。包包括HTML，CSS，JS代码和Figma源。
localize.tagline: 完全编码的网络应用程序的设计解决方案，创建

localize.description: 收集和編碼的通用部件、圖表和即用屏幕。獲得完美編碼的網站或網絡應用，包括有用的工具。包包括HTML，CSS，JS代碼和Figma源。
localize.tagline: 完全編碼的網絡應用程序的設計解決方案，創建

previous.excerpt: Create your video once - publish it everywhere. Cut different pieces of content from your video and change the aspect ratio to share them across all your social networks.
previous.title: Repurpose Video Content - Cherry-pick highlights & turn them into standalone videos 🍒

localize.description: 一次性创建您的视频 - 到处发布。从您的视频中剪切不同的内容，并改变长宽比，以便在您的所有社交网络上分享它们。
localize.tagline: 挑选亮点并将其转化为独立的视频 🍒。

localize.description: 一次性創建您的視頻 - 到處發佈。從您的視頻中剪切不同的內容，並改變長寬比，以便在您的所有社交網絡上分享它們。
localize.tagline: 挑選亮點並將其轉化爲獨立的視頻 🍒。

next.excerpt: Dreambook is simply a database specially created for your dreams. Without thinking of limitation, save your dreams, analyze them. After you start using Dreambook, with the upcoming features and updates you will have more than you expect from your dreams.
next.title: Dreambook - Dream journal, interpreter and tracker

localize.description: 梦境簿只是一个专门为您的梦境建立的数据库。不考虑任何限制，保存你的梦境，分析它们。当您开始使用Dreambook后，随着即将到来的功能和更新，您将从您的梦想中获得更多的东西。
localize.tagline: 梦境日记、解释者和追踪者

localize.description: 夢境簿只是一個專門爲您的夢境建立的數據庫。不考慮任何限制，保存你的夢境，分析它們。當您開始使用Dreambook後，隨着即將到來的功能和更新，您將從您的夢想中獲得更多的東西。
localize.tagline: 夢境日記、解釋者和追蹤者
